decision_conditions: The amendment to the approved application listed below is considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in its own right and not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendment is deemed to be accepted:
- amendment of materials to courtyard wall, substation and main entrance
- Description: Erection of 2/3 storey 88 bedroom and suites care home for the frail elderly
(Class C2 Use) with ancillary and communal accommodation, together with associated
landscaping, access arrangements, car and cycle parking, servicing, refuse and recycling.
The applicant is advised that this amendment relates solely to the item detailed above and shown on drawing numbers
Jpeg image of Green GRP structure,
A100411 - 2014 Rev. 01 and not to any other deviation from the approved drawings.
Furthermore, this amendment does not in any way alter or remove any previous conditions imposed on the original approved application reference P0755.21.
description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref: P0755.21 dated 27/05/2022 and Ref: N0070 dated 16/12/2022 to allow for amendment of materials to courtyard wall, substation and main entrance (Erection of 2/3 storey 88 bedroom and suites care home for the frail elderly (Class C2 Use) with ancillary and communal accommodation, together with associated landscaping, access arrangements, car and cycle parking, servicing, refuse and recycling)
